name: Jolly Jumper (Craptastic 2022) (Megastyle)
description:
*** VIP INVITATION ***
You are invited to the 2022 Craptastic Rope Jump Competition.
When: Today, right now!!
Where: At the Megastyle beach

You must present this invitation in order to be admitted.
Same rules as last year: No intro linkers allowed, unless they can prove that they can play the game without using trainer.

Welcome to Jolly Jumper - a 4k Craptastic game coding contribution from Megastyle. All code by Docster, with pixels and sid music by Rotteroy. 

Jolly Jumper is a  one button game where you only use firebutton to control your charakter. You use it to start the game, to enter the playfield and you use it to jump. Avoid the swinging rope and try to complete the set.  On the right side of the screen you will see how many reps you have left before the set is complete. 

When a set is finished, you will be sent out of the playfield, and you have to enter it over again  to start next set. If you get hit by the rope, it will be game over.

Good luck! :)
